code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant AlbumPage
    participant AlbumDAO
    participant ImageDAO
    participant CTX
    participant TemplateEngine

    AlbumPage ->>+ AlbumDAO: new AlbumDAO(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    AlbumPage ->> AlbumDAO: get(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    alt album exists
        AlbumDAO -->> AlbumPage: Optional<Album>
        AlbumPage ->>+ ImageDAO: new ImageDAO(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        AlbumPage ->> ImageDAO: getAlbumImages(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
        ImageDAO -->> AlbumPage: images
        AlbumPage -->> CTX: setVariable(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        AlbumPage -->> CTX: setVariable(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
        AlbumPage -->> CTX: setVariable(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        AlbumPage -->> TemplateEngine: process(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    else album does not exist
        AlbumDAO -->> AlbumPage: Optional.empty(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
        AlbumPage --> AlbumPage: response.sendError(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    end
